dt: {bc}a systematic exposition or argument in writing including a methodical discussion of the facts and principles involved and conclusions reached

et: Middle English {it}tretis{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}tretiz{/it}, alteration of {it}tretez, traitet{/it}, from Medieval Latin {it}tractatus{/it}, from Latin {it}tractare{/it} to treat, handle
shortdef: a systematic exposition or argument in writing including a methodical discussion of the facts and principles involved and conclusions reached
